attributes.action: Make the wearing of cycling helmets whilst riding bicycles on public roads law.
attributes.additional_details:
I have many friends who cycle and I am well aware of the risks, some maybe down to the individual, but many can be down to other road users. As well as my own accident recently I have 2 friends who have  had bad crashes, both were wearing helmets and both survived, even though their bikes didn't! 
There is no question regarding the importance of wearing a cycling helmet, we need to make the wearing of helmets law without delay.
attributes.background:
31 years ago I was involved in an accident, I was run over whilst riding my bike, at that time I considered myself lucky to have only a fractured skull. 
This weekend I suffered another fall whilst road cycling with friends. It is clear from the condition of my helmet that it likely saved my life!
